A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I think any Star Wars fan going into this film is expecting some level of predictability\, over-dramatized scenes\, and general corniness. That is why we love Star Wars. They are simple and mystical and good for the soul. 

However\, this film made cowards of our heroes\, introduced ridiculous and unnecessary powers for the Jedi's\, forced too many story arcs in a single film\, and limited its best characters and actors. 

Simply - it was bad writing\, (very) bad and ill-timed jokes\, and poorly constructed. It doesn't have to be Shakespeare - but please don't insult us again.
